mapper.insert: insert into sys_clinic_sell_target (id, january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{january,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{february,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{march,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{april,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{may,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{june,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{july,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{august,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{september,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{october,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{november,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{december,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_clinic_sell_target set january = #{january,jdbcType=INTEGER}, february = #{february,jdbcType=INTEGER}, march = #{march,jdbcType=INTEGER}, april = #{april,jdbcType=INTEGER}, may = #{may,jdbcType=INTEGER}, june = #{june,jdbcType=INTEGER}, july = #{july,jdbcType=INTEGER}, august = #{august,jdbcType=INTEGER}, september = #{september,jdbcType=INTEGER}, october = #{october,jdbcType=INTEGER}, november = #{november,jdbcType=INTEGER}, december = #{december,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december from sys_clinic_sell_target where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december from sys_clinic_sell_target

select a.id, b.name as sysClinicName, a.january, a.february, a.march, a.april, a.may, a.june, a.july, a.august, a.september, a.october, a.november, a.december from sys_clinic_sell_target a left join sys_clinic b on a.id = b.id
(b.name like '${sysClinicName}%' or b.code like '${sysClinicName}%') and
